name: Crew
dialogue: Captain Cecil, we are about to arrive!

name: Crew
dialogue: Why are we robbing crystals from innocent people?

name: Crew
dialogue: Do we really have to keep doing this?

name: Crew
dialogue: Give us the Crystal of Water!

name: Cecil
dialogue: Then, take the crystal by force!

name: Elder
dialogue: My! All right... Take the crystal!

name: Crew
dialogue: You should have said it earlier!

name: Elder
dialogue: Why is the King of Baron doing this? Why do you pursue the crystals so eagerly?

name: Crew
dialogue: We take pride in being members of the Red Wings! Looting is out of the question!

name: Crew
dialogue: We can't stand doing this anymore!

name: Cecil
dialogue: Listen! Possessing the crystal is an essential factor for our prosperity. Moreover, His Majesty judged that Mysidians know too much about the secret of the crystal. We are the Red Wings, the air force of the Kingdom Baron! The Royal Command is absolute. Crew: Captain!

name: Crew
dialogue: But there are too many monsters these days...

name: Baigan
dialogue: Oh, Cecil! Is it the Crystal of Water?

name: Baigan
dialogue: What are you trying to say? This way, Cecil.

name: Baigan
dialogue: Your Majesty! I'm afraid Cecil has developed quite a rebellious air.

name: King
dialogue: Truly!? Well done, Baigan! We must do something. Call him in! Baigan: Yes, Your Majesty.

name: Baigan
dialogue: Cecil!  His Majesty summons you. Please come in.

name: King
dialogue: We thank you for successfully completing the mission. Now, where is it?

name: Cecil
dialogue: Here, My Liege. Hand over the crystal.

name: King
dialogue: Good!  Cecil...... You may leave now.

name: Cecil
dialogue: We do not understand the meaning of taking crystals away from honest people.

name: King
dialogue: We do know of your discontent, Cecil. If you cannot trust me, I can no longer place the Red Wings in your command. You are dismissed from your post!

name: King
dialogue: Go and hunt the Summoned Monsters of the Misty Valley! And... Take this Package to the Village Mist. You may depart tomorrow morning!

name: King
dialogue: If you're concerned about Cecil that much, go with him, Kain!
